description: Numbers that contain primes to odd powers only.
comments: Complement of the union of {1} and A072587. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 15 2012, corrected version from Jun 23 2002A036537 is a subsequence and this sequence is a subsequence of A162644. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 08 2009Numbers whose sum of divisors is equal to the sum of bi-unitary divisors: A000203(a(n)) = A188999(a(n)). [_Paolo P. Lava_, Oct 08 2014]
references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
E. Cohen, Quadratic congruences with an odd number of summands, Amer. Math. Monthly, 73 (1966), 138-143.
mathematica: ok[n_] := And @@ OddQ /@ FactorInteger[n][[All, 2]];Select[Range[2, 101], ok](* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Apr 22 2011 *)
prog: (Haskell)a002035 n = a002035_list !! (n-1)a002035_list = filter (all odd . a124010_row) [1..]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 14 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
